thread.title: Michael Francis of Francis Injury Named a 2025 Top Attorney by Fort Worth Magazine
thread.title_full: Michael Francis of Francis Injury Named a 2025 Top Attorney by Fort Worth Magazine

author: EIN Newswire
title: Michael Francis of Francis Injury Named a 2025 Top Attorney by Fort Worth Magazine
text:
Michael Francis of Francis Injury was named a 2025 Top Attorney by Fort Worth Magazine, recognizing his excellence and leadership in personal injury law.
FORT WORTH, TX, UNITED STATES, January 7, 2026 /EINPresswire.com/ — Francis Injury: Car & Truck Accident Lawyers is proud to announce that Michael “Mensa Mike” Francis, founder and lead trial attorney, has been recognized as a Top Attorney for 2025 by Fort Worth Magazine. This prestigious accolade highlights Michael’s outstanding reputation, legal expertise, and the high level of peer recognition he has earned in the North Texas legal community.
The Fort Worth Magazine Top Attorneys list is published annually and features outstanding lawyers from a wide range of practice areas. Selection is based on nominations from other attorneys and evaluation by a rigorous panel, underscoring both professional excellence and trust among legal peers in the Greater Fort Worth area. Michael Francis appears on the 2025 list in the Personal Injury – Plaintiff category — an honor that reflects his proven track record advocating for seriously injured clients across Texas.
“I’m truly humbled to be included among such distinguished legal professionals,” said Michael Francis. “This recognition from fellow attorneys is a meaningful affirmation of our firm’s commitment to excellence and dedicated advocacy for clients who have suffered life-altering injuries.”
Francis Injury has built a strong reputation for tenacious representation in car and truck accident, wrongful death, and other serious personal injury cases. Michael’s experience includes board certification in Personal Injury Trial Law, selection among the Top 100 Trial Lawyers, and accolades from national legal organizations.
About Francis Injury:
Francis Injury is a Fort Worth-based personal injury law firm representing injured victims across the state of Texas. With decades of trial experience and a client-first philosophy, the firm helps accident victims pursue maximum compensation through aggressive negotiation and courtroom advocacy.
